dmca.title: Debt Collection Service Alleges Infringement by Competitor
dmca.body:
[private]
[private]
Pittsboro, IN 46167 
XXX-XXX-XXXX

Fax: XXX-XXX-XXXX

Google, Inc.
Attn: Customer Support, DMCA Complaints
[private]
Mountain View, CA 94043

Via fax: XXX-XXX-XXXX

Dear Google Customer Support Professionals,

1. The copyrighted work at issue is the text that appears on http://www.hamptoncollects.com/Web/HAICOLLECT.asp

Search Query 1: "Internet collection center for all of your commercial collection agency activity and monitoring requirements" http://www.google.com/search?hl=en&lr=&ie=UTF-8 &oe=UTF-8&q%%22Internet+collection+center+for+all+of+your+ commercial+collection+agency+activity+and+monitoring+requirements%22 &btnG=Google+Search

Search Query 2: "Document upload & imaging capabilities (send & view all claim information & correspondence electronically" 
http://www.google.com/search?hl=en&lr=&ie=UTF-8&oe=UTF-8 &q%22Document+upload+%26+imaging+capabilities+ %28send+%26+view+all+claim+information+ %26+correspondence+electronically%22&btnG=Google+Search

Infringing Web Pages: http://www.wcgcollects.com

2. My Contact Information: [private]@hamptoncollects.com

3. Infringer's Contact Information:
Williams, Cohen & Gray, Inc.
[private], HOUSTON TX. 77074
Phone: XXX-XXX-XXXX
Fax: XXX-XXX-XXXX
Admin email: [private]@iwon.com

4. I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages, is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

5. I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

Sincerely


[private]
[private]@hamptoncollects.com
